00240 /*******************************************************************************

00243 
00245 #if defined(_RTCC_CTRL_BUMODETSEN_MASK)
00246 #define RTCC_INIT_DEFAULT                                                   \
00247 {                                                                           \
00248   true,     /* Start counting when init done.                           */  \
00249   false,    /* Disable RTCC during debug halt.                          */  \
00250   false,    /* Disable precounter wrap on ch. 0 CCV value.              */  \
00251   false,    /* Disable counter wrap on ch. 1 CCV value.                 */  \
00252   rtccCntPresc_32, /* 977 us per tick.                                  */  \
00253   rtccCntTickPresc, /* Counter increments according to prescaler value. */  \
00254   false,    /* No RTCC storage on backup mode entry.                    */  \
00255   false,    /* No RTCC oscillator failure detection.                    */  \
00256   rtccCntModeNormal, /* Normal RTCC mode.                               */  \
00257   false,    /* No leap year correction.                                 */  \
00258 }
00259 #else
00260 #define RTCC_INIT_DEFAULT                                                   \
00261 {                                                                           \
00262   true,     /* Start counting when init done.                           */  \
00263   false,    /* Disable RTCC during debug halt.                          */  \
00264   false,    /* Disable precounter wrap on ch. 0 CCV value.              */  \
00265   false,    /* Disable counter wrap on ch. 1 CCV value.                 */  \
00266   rtccCntPresc_32, /* 977 us per tick.                                  */  \
00267   rtccCntTickPresc, /* Counter increments according to prescaler value. */  \
00268   false,    /* No RTCC oscillator failure detection.                    */  \
00269   rtccCntModeNormal, /* Normal RTCC mode.                               */  \
00270   false,    /* No leap year correction.                                 */  \
00271 }
00272 #endif
00273 
00275 #define RTCC_CH_INIT_COMPARE_DEFAULT                                        \
00276 {                                                                           \
00277   rtccCapComChModeCompare,     /* Select output compare mode.     */        \
00278   rtccCompMatchOutActionPulse, /* Create pulse on compare match.  */        \
00279   rtccPRSCh0,                  /* PRS channel 0 (not used).       */        \
00280   rtccInEdgeNone,              /* No edge detection.              */        \
00281   rtccCompBaseCnt,             /* Counter comparison base.        */        \
00282   0,                           /* No compare mask bits set.       */        \
00283   rtccDayCompareModeMonth      /* Don't care */                             \
00284 }
00285 
00287 #define RTCC_CH_INIT_CAPTURE_DEFAULT                                        \
00288 {                                                                           \
00289   rtccCapComChModeCapture,     /* Select input capture mode.      */        \
00290   rtccCompMatchOutActionPulse, /* Create pulse on capture.        */        \
00291   rtccPRSCh0,                  /* PRS channel 0.                  */        \
00292   rtccInEdgeRising,            /* Rising edge detection.          */        \
00293   rtccCompBaseCnt,             /* Don't care.                     */        \
00294   0,                           /* Don't care.                     */        \
00295   rtccDayCompareModeMonth      /* Don't care                      */        \
00296 }

00471 {

00546 /***************************************************************************/
00557 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t RTCC_IntGetEnabled( void )
00558 {
00559   uint32_t tmp;
00560 
00561   tmp = RTCC->IEN;
00562 
00563   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupt flags. */
00564   return RTCC->IF & tmp;
00565 }

00641 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t RTCC_StatusGet( void )
00642 {
00643   while ( RTCC->SYNCBUSY & RTCC_SYNCBUSY_CMD )
00644   {
00645     // Wait for syncronization.
00646   }
00647   return RTCC->STATUS;
00648 }
